title: Check Customer Eligibility for DER Program
description: A customer is interested in a new battery program. The agent must check if they are eligible based on their location and existing utility service.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's address is within the program's designated grid service area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the address is in an eligible zone.

tasks.description: Check if the customer is on a Time-of-Use (TOU) electricity rate, which is a prerequisite for the program.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer is on a TOU rate plan.

tasks.description: Inform the customer they are eligible and provide them with the next steps to enroll.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the positive eligibility status and enrollment process.
